title: Looking for my Lover
body:
Not really looking for a lover, but I am looking for someone who plays Rakan. I'm still very new to LoL and very inexperienced with Xayah but I thought it'd be pretty cool to see them fight together. I'm still playing vs AI just to get my bearings so if you play with me, just keep in mind I have no idea what I'm doing. If you're the type of person who takes newbies under your experienced and supple wing, I could use some guiding too. I just mainly need someone to play with. Like I'm so lonely, guys. I don't really know this community yet so I don't know if this'll blow up in my face or something like that but just thought I'd throw this out there.
  {{champion:497}} {{champion:498}} Pls... call me...

replies.body:
Typically this kind of post would best fit under Player Recruitment or Gameplay, but it looks like you already found someone to partner up with ^_^!

{{sticker:sg-kiko}}

Hey there summoner! Phatmage here and Rakan in muh boi! Feel free to add me and I can play when I can! Rito steals my time but I would love to play SR or ARAM with ya!
{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
